instruction: Tap the mirror arrangements to place them in the highlighted areas to ensure that the light from the source reaches the observer.

options.feedback: Uh-oh! The light bends away from the observer after reflecting from the mirror.
Uh-oh! The light strikes the non-reflecting part of the mirror.
Excellent! The light undergoes multiple reflections and reaches the observer.

question: Determine the point from which the light ray will emerge from the tube when a light ray enters this setup of multiple mirrors from point C.
solution:
• Mirrors can help the light ray to bend multiple times.
• In this setup the mirrors are arranged in a way that the incoming light retraces back.
summary: You just explored that a mirror can change the path of the light ray. Therefore, multiple mirrors can reflect the ray multiple times.
